physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Transaminitis with fever and vague abdominal pain.
Afebrile with a soft, non-tender abdomen, no splenomegaly, no ascites, and liver edge palpable 2â€“3 cm below the costal margin.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Liver function test values remained elevated, and HBV DNA level was 12000 pg/mL.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Slightly enlarged right lobe of the liver on ultrasound.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No changes in serological test results for HBV; transaminase levels remained elevated.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: HBV DNA suppressed to undetectable level while receiving lamivudine.
HBV DNA level elevated at 1370 pg/mL after stopping lamivudine therapy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Transaminase levels remained elevated since July 2001.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No changes in serological test results for HBV.
